items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great holiday Jams!
items.body: These women‚Äôs pajamas are incredibly soft and cozy‚Äîperfect for lounging and sleeping. The fabric feels gentle against the skin and keeps me comfortable all night long. They fit beautifully and are well-made, with a relaxed yet flattering style. I love how warm and snuggly they are, and they‚Äôve quickly become my go-to pajamas for relaxing at home. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Ms. Jackson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are perfect!
items.body: Love, Love, Love! All I'll be saying - these are perfect! Warm, soft, comfortable! Amazing- I was a little hesitate about buying pj's that were more money then I'd spent in the past -but so worth it! I'm going to sleep good tonight!! I've lost a lot of wieght in the last couple of months and so eveything is big on me- the added issue I worry about buying the right size- I took my measurements before I made this purchase but it's still a toss up. I went up in the sizing purchase and happy I did, they fit a little big but with washing and drying and lots of wear- I think I made the right choice- I have plans to buy more in 2026-TRUST. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect üëåüèº
items.body: I was really nervous about buying before a trip while trying to read reviews of customers on the product but was highly impressed, I sized up from my norm because I‚Äôm bigger on bottom than on the top, I also worried about the sleeves being too long as well. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2 230lbs petite and this exceeded my expectations and calmed all worries. Pants slightly long but with my slippers on I‚Äôm not dragging‚Ä¶stretchy too and the shirt was perfect fit for me very soft very comfortable highly recommend! Read more
items.author: mj mccormick

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable
items.body: Now I‚Äôm very picking about my pajamas and these made the grade. They are soft and wash well. However, I do feel the sizing for the top is slightly off. Because I like the bigger. The bottoms fit as expected. I will be ordering and gifting more for Christmas. Read more
items.author: Fox

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pajamas!
items.body: These pajamas are seriously the best! I specifically have the heatheted ones, which are a different material blend than the solids. I got a pair to wear for pregnancy, but the elastic in the waist and general flow of the fabric have made them still fit so comfortably post partum! They are warm, cozy, cute, breathable, and they wash super well. Read more
items.author: San Diego Gal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable and cute
items.body: I have these in two colors and love them. They‚Äôre soft. Breathable. Don‚Äôt wrinkle. I‚Äôm a medium but I‚Äôm also 5‚Äô8 so I purchased a large to make sure they were long enough and they are. They‚Äôre not see through - they‚Äôre a nice medium/thick material. It comes with a ribbon as a tie around the waist but I just removed them. They‚Äôre not needed. Will be buying more. Read more
items.author: Cheryl Dalton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect set for having a baby
items.body: I bought this pajama set right before I had my 3rd baby. I wanted something blue since I was having a boy and something super soft and comfy. This set definitely exceeded my expectorations and it made me feel so relaxed which you need to be right after having a baby. The fit was just right, I could have sized up one but I didn‚Äôt want to be swimming in it either. Read more
items.author: Allyson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Received a returned set instead of new
items.body: I bought 2 pairs - one for my daughter and one for me. When I took the first set out I loved them- soft- great fit- The second pair was obviously a return. No tags, different random plastic bag and on further inspection I could tell they‚Äôve been washed. These were pricey. I‚Äôm disappointed. Read more
items.author: Flowergirl31

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lake Sunset Yellow, Stripes Grey, Plaid Black, Dark Grey, Black, Lake Red, Stripes Blue, Flamingo Pink, Lake Light Yellow, Lake Mocha, Lake Green, Snowflake Grey, Lake Apricot, Light Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
